item.title: 具有影响力的华盛顿智囊团称中国芯片光刻技术落后
item.description: 中国在推进半导体光刻技术方面面临重大挑战，这是其实现技术自给自足和在与美国的贸易战中取得优势的关键障碍。【原文：China faces significant challenges advancing its semiconductor lithography, a key hurdle for its drive toward technological self-sufficiency and superiority in the trade war with the US.】

item.title: 欧特克放弃收购软件公司 PTC
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，欧特克公司不再寻求收购 PTC 公司，这将成为今年最大的交易之一。【原文：Autodesk Inc. is no longer pursuing an acquisition of PTC Inc., people familiar with the matter said, which would have ranked as one of the year’s largest deals.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Kioxia 计划首次在海外发行债券，加入日本同行行列
item.description: Kioxia Holdings Corp. 计划通过出售美元债券筹集多达 30 亿美元的资金，这将是该公司首次发行公司债券，这是海外投资者对日本公司票据（包括风险较高的公司）青睐有加的最新迹象。【原文：Kioxia Holdings Corp. plans to raise as much as $3 billion via a dollar bond sale that would be its first corporate debt issuance, in the latest sign of investor appetite abroad for Japanese company notes including riskier firms.】

item.title: 尽管刚果禁止钴出口，但中国钴业公司（CMOC）仍提高了钴产量
item.description: 尽管非洲国家禁止出口钴，但中国五矿集团有限公司（CMOC Group Ltd.）今年上半年在刚果民主共和国的两个矿山生产了更多的钴。【原文：China’s CMOC Group Ltd. produced more cobalt at its two mines in the Democratic Republic of Congo in the first half of this year, despite the African nation’s ban on exports.】

item.title: 特朗普关税针对美国大小贸易伙伴
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周六公布了致欧盟和墨西哥的信函，威胁要对这两个主要贸易伙伴的商品各征收 30% 的关税，这是一个重要的里程碑。如果他兑现了他的威胁，那么美国进口商必须支付新的高额税款的贸易额将增加到进入美国的商品价值的一半以上。【原文：With the letters unveiled Saturday to the European Union and Mexico threatening tariffs of 30% on each of the major trading partners’ goods, President Donald Trump passed a significant milestone. If he delivers on his threats, he’s increasing the amount of trade on which US importers will have to pay new elevated taxes to more than half the value of goods coming into the US.】

item.title: 银行开始将博姿 42.5 亿美元的收购债务推向市场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，银行正在寻求为博姿出售 22.5 亿美元的定期贷款和 20 亿美元的等值债券，以帮助其为美国私募股权公司 Sycamore Partners 的收购提供资金。【原文：Banks are looking to sell $2.25 billion of term loans and $2 billion equivalent of bonds for Boots, to help finance its acquisition by US private equity firm Sycamore Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 报道称印尼称美国石油交易取决于关税谈判
item.description: 据当地新闻机构援引一位高级官员的话称，印尼购买价值数十亿美元的美国石油相关产品的计划取决于关税谈判的结果。【原文：Indonesia’s plan to buy billions of dollars’ worth of US oil-related goods depends on the outcome of tariff negotiations, according to a top official cited by local news outlets.】

item.description: 在这个充满冒险者的世界里，一些市场上最大的赌徒正在撤出他们的筹码。【原文：In a world brimming with risk takers, some of the market’s biggest gamblers are taking their chips off the table.】

item.title: 印度 6 月通胀降温，有望进一步降息
item.description: 印度的通货膨胀率连续第八个月下降，这加强了中央银行进一步降息的理由。【原文：India’s inflation eased for the eighth consecutive month, strengthening the case for further interest rate cuts by the central bank.】

item.title: 消费者数据公司 NIQ Global 在美国首次公开募股中募资 12 亿美元
item.description: NIQ Global Intelligence Plc 正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 12 亿美元的资金，为夏季上市热潮再添一把火。【原文：NIQ Global Intelligence Plc is seeking to raise as much as $1.2 billion in a US initial public offering, adding to the rush of summer listings.】

item.title: 马来西亚为何要扣押已故大亨的 7 亿美元？
item.description: 帮助马来西亚走出亚洲金融危机的商业大亨戴姆-扎因丁（Daim Zainuddin）去世八个月后，被安葬在吉隆坡。【原文：It’s been eight months since Daim Zainuddin, the business tycoon credited with helping to pull Malaysia out of the Asian Financial Crisis, died and was buried in Kuala Lumpur.】

item.title: 新调查发现：人工智能约会软件功能不受 Z 世代欢迎
item.description: 彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的一项最新调查发现，由于 Z 世代用户对新的人工智能功能保持警惕，约会应用公司对人工智能的大量投资可能会白费。【原文：Dating app companies’ sizable investments in artificial intelligence could be in vain as Gen Z users remain wary of the new AI features, a new Bloomberg Intelligence survey found.】

item.title: 尽管预算紧张，不列颠哥伦比亚省拥有的初创企业基金仍着眼于增长
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省政府拥有的一家初创企业投资基金首席执行官表示，该基金正在研究如何进行资本重组和发展，包括吸收私人资本的可能性。【原文：An investment fund for startups owned by British Columbia’s government is studying how to recapitalize and grow, including the possibility of taking in private capital, its chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 德意志银行发现：德国不能将出口下滑归咎于特朗普
item.description: 德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）的研究显示，德国的全球出口地位近年来大幅恶化，这应归咎于结构性问题，而非唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税狂潮。【原文：Germany’s global export position has deteriorated substantially in recent years, according to research by the Bundesbank, which blames structural issues rather than President Donald Trump’s tariff spree.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为今年财报季将是选股旺季
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师表示，由于分析师的观点变得更加分歧，投资者在这个财报季应该更加挑剔。【原文：Investors should be more selective this earnings season as analysts’ views become more divergent, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 欧盟警告特朗普的关税威胁危及跨大西洋贸易

item.title: 汇丰银行称，美元抛售正成为泡沫，可能破灭
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的策略师认为，无休止的美元抛售开始看起来像一个泡沫；和所有泡沫一样，它终将破灭。【原文：Relentless dollar-selling is starting to look like a bubble — and, like all bubbles, it will eventually pop, according to HSBC Holdings Plc strategists.】

item.title: 大型银行的温和盈利前景为更多收益敞开大门
item.description: 本周，美国最大的银行将拉开财报季的序幕，策略师们认为，华尔街对利润预期的低迷，为贷款机构继续在股市中飙升奠定了基础。【原文：As the biggest US banks kick off earnings season this week, strategists say Wall Street’s subdued profit expectations are setting the stage for lenders to continue their sizzling run in the stock market.】

item.title: 没有埃隆-马斯克，美国国家航空航天局还能运转吗？
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统和埃隆-马斯克的联盟破裂时，他们互相发出的所有威胁中，那些针对马斯克与美国政府的合同的威胁有可能造成最大的损害。【原文：Of all the threats that President Donald Trump and Elon Musk hurled at one another as their alliance fell apart, those targeting Musk’s contracts with the US government have the potential to do the most damage.】

item.title: 泰国内阁或将于周二批准新任央行行长
item.description: 泰国将于周二任命新的央行行长，结束长达数月的寻找现任行长塞萨布-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）继任者的过程。【原文：Thailand is poised to name its new central bank chief on Tuesday, ending a months-long process to find a successor to incumbent Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput, whose rocky five-year tenure ends in September.】

item.title: 中国人民银行支持银行适度购买债券，标明风险过高

item.title: 押注特朗普 30% 关税威胁不会持续，欧元表现坚挺
